attributes.action: make funds available for neccessary trials and research into xmrv and cfs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This virus has been found in 95% of people with CFS/Me/Fm and in 3.75% of healthy people. We need research done into the way it is spread. All over the country people will worry if they have past this virus on to their children or people they have been in contact with. My partner  has cfs/Fm/ Mcs. Between us we have 7 children, 1 is epileptic,1 autistic, 1 schizophrenic,1 developing symptoms of cfs. We also have 2 beautiful granddaughters and 1 on the way.How many more generations have to suffer before someone will act!
